attributes.action: Parliament members to declare their corporate sponsorships.
attributes.additional_details: To ensure votes count towards politicians and their sponsors in line with trading standards and the general public are aware of where their funds are going.
attributes.background: Agenda's have been clearly shown to be detrimental to the funds supporting covid. The people of the UK did not expect that their contribution to the country would be used to sponsor companies associated to parliament in a non-transparent selection process. Take example the invalid PPE purchases.

rejection.details:
MPs are already required to declare financial interests which are recorded in a register. You can find out more here: https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/registers-of-interests/register-of-members-financial-interests/

If you want MPs to be banned from having shares or positions in any businesses, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562361
